skills.name: RECLAIMER
desc: • Deal physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Critically Strike.
• Remove all Heal Block, Heal Reduction and Crave effects, including Silver effects, from all allies.
• Heal all allies based on your ATK.
Exalted:

• Remove All Stat Increase Effects, including Golden and Innate effects, from the target. Permanently Increase ATK on self by 100% if an effect was removed this way. This effect cannot remove base Stat Increase effects from Bespoke Cosmic Talismans and does not apply to bosses.
• Deal Additional True Damage to the target.

skills.name: CALL OF AVALON
desc: • Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver and Unblockable effects, from all allies.
• Heal and Revive all allies with full HP.
• Instantly gain an Extra Turn.
Become Exalted and gain the following effects:
• Reduce Damage Taken by 75% and Reflect 300% of the damage you receive as true damage to all enemies.
• Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver and Unblockable effects, from all allies and grant them Endure and Immunity for 2 turns after every action.
• Your other skills gain additional Exalted effects.

skills.name: FINAL MISSIVE
desc: • Deal physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Critically Strike.
• Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from all enemies before dealing damage.
• Remove all Heal Block, Heal Reduction and Crave effects, including Silver and Innate effects, from all allies.
• Heal all allies based on your ATK.
Exalted:
• Remove and Prevent all Invincibility, Shield and Damage Reduction effects, including Golden and Innate effects, on all enemies until they die. This effect does not apply to bosses.
• Deal Additional True Damage to all enemies.
